presets.content: We la pye we ya ja pye ni koŋɔn binɛgbɔhɔ ki wo lapye ɲɛɛŋɛ fuŋɔn tɛgi Lamɛrigɛɛn Fiige Foroba Lapye (USAID) Vision Mondiale na fora ɔstralien gbavɛrinama binɛɲɛɛŋɛ kamapyevɛɛ nɔhɔpireti All Children Reading: A Grand Challenge for Development (ACD GCD) lapyeɲɛɛɲɛ ni Global Book Alliance leeyapye SIL LEAD, Inc. We sɛmu we fuŋɔn keere ni pii p’a lapye wu tɛgi ma naha jo ACR GCD Global Book Alliance. Wu fuŋɔn keere ni pee mo wii kaŋaan ɲɛ nigi gbangban wɛ wu fugɔn keere ni wu ɲɛri kana ɲɛ ki yɛ pyaa ACR GCD wu fuŋɔn ni wɛ. Lee bɛ kadugo piingɛ bɛri ba ta wu ɲɛrikana ni, lee ɲɛ ACR GCD wu fin wɛ.
